original_text: But he shall have power over the treasures of gold and of silver, and over all the precious things of Egypt: and the Libyans and the Ethiopians shall be at his steps.
korean_text: 그가 권세로 애굽의 금 은과 모든 보물을 차지할 것이요 리비아 사람과 구스 사람이 그의 시종이 되리라

sentences.original_text: over the treasures of gold and of silver
and over all the precious things of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽의 모든 귀한 것들을 다스릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: and the Libyans and the Ethiopians
